alert.note: Alert for Christian; Todd (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 12:16PM EDT until June 29 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Christian County in south central Kentucky... Todd County in south central Kentucky... * Until noon CDT. * At 1115 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles north of Pembroke to 9 miles northeast of Elkton, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Oak Grove, Elkton, Guthrie, Pembroke, Trenton, Justice and Allensville. This includes Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 90 and 92. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
